title: Asian style carp cooked in tomato sauce
directions: In a large bowl, mix tomatoes, onion, garlic, bay leaves, lime juice with the fish, mix well and leave in the fridge for at least an hour. Next remove the fish from the marinade, discard the bay leaves and set aside.
Place the remaining marinade along with diced pepper in a deep skillet and heat over medium heat. Cook for about 8-10 minutes or until peppers are tender.
Add coconut milk and stock, bring to a boil and add the sugar and fish and oyster sauces. Mix well, add the fish in one layer and cook for 10 minutes or until cooked inside.
Stir in the chopped spring onions and coriander. Season with salt, pepper and Tabasco to taste and serve.
ingredients: 1 carp cleaned cut into thick slices
tabasco, salt and pepper to taste
